titleStmt.title: A reply unto severall treatises pleading for the armes now taken up by subjects in the pretended defence of religion and liberty. By name, unto the reverend and learned divines which pleaded Scripture and reason for defensive arms. The author of the Treatise of monarchy. The author of the Fuller answer his reply. By H. Fern D.D. &c.
titleStmt.author: Ferne, H. (Henry), 1602-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: A reply to "A treatise of monarchie" by Philip Hunton, "A fuller answer to a treatise written by Doctor Ferne entituled The resolving of conscience upon this question" by Charles Herle, and "Scripture and reason" by Herbert Palmer.
In this edition title page line 11 ends "arms." and p. 97 begins "I would to God,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
